scripts.update-frontend: cd apps/connoraleksfrontend && npm update && npm upgrade -y && cd ../..
scripts.update-aisearch: cd apps/aisearch && npm update && npm upgrade -y && cd ../..
scripts.build-frontend: npm run update-frontend && cd apps/connoraleksfrontend && npm run build && mv build build-connoraleksfrontend && rm -rf ../build-connoraleksfrontend && mv build-connoraleksfrontend ../ && cd ../..
scripts.build-aisearch: npm run update-aisearch && cd apps/aisearch && npm run build && mv build build-aisearch && rm -rf ../build-aisearch && mv build-aisearch ../ && cd ../..
